strings.usernamePasswordNotCorrect: Either the username or password aren't correct.
strings.usernameTaken: That username is already in use, sorry!
strings.loginPageAbout: Campaign is a simple open source web app to help you manage gaming campaigns.
strings.userEntryRequiredValidation: You need to enter a user.
strings.userEntryInvalidAccountValidation: That person does't have an account here.
strings.victoryPointsEntryRequiredValidation: At least put a 0 if there was no score!
strings.minimumOneFactionValidation: You must add at least one faction to your entry.
strings.factionNameRequiredValidation: Each faction in your campaign needs a name.
strings.minimumOneFactionRequiredValidator: You must add at least one faction to your campaign.
strings.usernameRequiredValidator: You'll want a username, trust me.
strings.passwordRequiredValidator: You should use the easiest password possible, but you'll need one to keep your friends out of your account.
strings.attackerRequiredValidator: You have to add an attacker!
strings.territoryRequiredValidator: You must select a territory to attack.
strings.uniqueFactionNameValidator: Factions in your campaign must have a unique name.
strings.howMuch: How much do you want to give?
strings.atLeastOne: If you're going to give, you have to give at least 1.
strings.giveTerritoryBonusTooltip: Give territory bonus to another user.
